data.name: Portal Stories: Forbidden Testing Tracks
data.detailed_description:
Portal Stories: Forbidden Testing Tracks ("PFT") is a single developer's free community-created Portal 2 modification.
You play as [classified], a test subject who discovers an old personality core called "SAIC" that leads you through the testing track: "Quebeck Seven," also known as the Forbidden Testing Track.


PFT adds many new test elements, weapons, enemies, and so on, as well as 30+ new maps and over 150 new voice lines.


PFT is set to be released on October 10, 2022, exactly 15 years after the initial release of Portal.
This mod is meant to expand on these ideas.

Features


Weapons:
  • Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device (aka Portalgun)
  • Aperture Science Handheld Paint Spreading Device (aka Paintgun)
  • Aperture Science Handheld Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator (aka Gravitygun)
  • Aperture Science Handheld Long Reaching Object Dissloving Device (aka Fizzlergun)
  • Aperture Science Handheld Time Manipulation device (aka Timegun)

New Test Elements:
  • Hoverturret
  • NPC Button
  • Vent
  • Exploding Cube
  • Portal Door
  • Dimension Door
  • Vacuum Tube
  • Blue Laser
  • Time Button

data.short_description: PFT is a free community made Portal 2 mod and introduces lots of old, new, alternative and forgotten game mechanics. It tells the story of a test subject named [Classified], who finds the Personality Sphere "SAIC" and explores the long forgotten Forbidden Testing Track Quebeck Seven

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Vista / XP
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 2.0b (ATI Radeon X800 or higher / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Something out of the century

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.6.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Something out of the century

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Something out of the century
